title: Do teachers use technology well? - Quora

response.answer_text: We can say yes. Nowadays, technology is transforming the shape of institutions. From students, teachers, academic staff to parents, technology is at the fingertip of everyone. There is a great revolution in education with Educational ERP solutions. Automation in education making teachers more active and helping them in delivering better education efficiently. The digital transformation in education allows teacher and students to connect through the mobile app technology, sending notifications of classes/ lectures, allowing them to manage the classroom, attendance, exam and results and everything that a teacher wants. And this all become possible by a single Education ERP/SIS solution. It automates every single process in the institutions to make teaching more effective and reducing academic operations cost at the same time. So we can say that teachers are using technology very well and adding it to their day to day life to make the education system better and advanced.
